Reviews.Title: “Don't even think about this one!”
Reviews.Author: BellaroseAnnecy
Reviews.Content: worst hotel opportunity stay besides smelly socks found drawer bed drains hotel stank else world dreaded head night complaining filthy told cleaning independent company hotel booked cleaned properly thinking amsterdam dont waist money time cheap cancel booked advance

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely awful”
Reviews.Author: lou6062
Reviews.Content: please ignore bad reviews true worst hotels dirty smelly staff indifferent minute curtains hang shower drained sealant bottom black mould homeless people loathe stay advise hotel booking site remove listing amsterdam tourist board close

Reviews.Title: “Do not bother”
Reviews.Author: Wendylou60
Reviews.Content: booked hotel trepidation read previous negative reviews email previously hotel management responded negative reviews addressed concern reply bland didnt dirty dingy bathroom smelt shower sealant thick mould carpet curtains filthy towels water pressure shower didnt drain wellbut change hang clothes probably left anyway window clean air staff disinterested

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting - Don't go!”
Reviews.Author: little_mis_star
Reviews.Content: friends stayed hotel premise getting hotel wrong price extortionate quality placed fifth floor 6 beds crammed bed camp location okay agree reviews wish tripadvisor booking stay horrible grotty dirty avoid complained due false advertising offer consolation horrible

Reviews.Title: “Could and should do better in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Skiwithjill
Reviews.Content: im echo pretty reviews regarding hotel lot stay else indeed dirty carpet reception looked hadnt vaccumed surfaces hadnt wiped dingy bed uncomfortable breakfast walls thin hear people eating left morning bed bugs miracle location pretty treelined canal course doesnt lacks shudder friends recommneded

Reviews.Title: “sleazy, sleazy”
Reviews.Author: sleven56
Reviews.Content: nights madness hotels slept singel beds located main street loud couldnt close window nght slept double bed avoid noise street wasnt ventilation air bad lights didt noisy street guest decided stay third night promptly requested money third night course refused told money cancell reservation seven days advance told shouldnt paid nights instead paid daily basis howvever receptionist told pay nights advance hotel called worse ive slept amsterdam ps bed bugs

Reviews.Title: “Do not believe the web site photos, reality is very different.”
Reviews.Author: shakirajames
Reviews.Content: booked hotel online based photos official web site wished id read reviews entrance dirty looks cheapest hostels isnt tried cancel told 7 days notice card details booked officially door bed 2 hours clean returned absolutely fair sheets towels clean hardly constantly smelt sewage wardrobe hole couldnt wasnt door called hotel removed self respecting hotel booking web site stay

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel Ive ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: girl_e
Reviews.Content: booked hotel vivaldi basement pavement level window dusty noisy changed sister hotel doors tiny barely double bed bedding bathroom nice clean else decided look closely dirty bits outside window onto stairwell morning downstairs hallway scattered droppings stayed day breakfast hotel breakfast tatty broken windows looking onto garden overflowing bins breakfast cheap processed ham cheese budget sliced bread cereal else coffee machine free breakfast decent staff ok grumpy handed key stay grunted didnt thankyou wed stay positive note reasonably located 20 min walk centre shower

Reviews.Title: “Hell hole..pls take these reviews seriously!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Wema34
Reviews.Content: read reviews booking hell hole entrance door stairway lift people theres space twin beds tv hung dangerously wall faced road window onto street separated spot dumping noisy bathroom okay toilet space sink breakfast disaster sitting space guests teacoffee served helpful worst hotel negative view amsterdam till checked nicer hotel hague

Reviews.Title: “very basic, with central location”
Reviews.Author: Pilts
Reviews.Content: looking fancy crash hotel vivaldi check vivaldi inconvenient stayed triple bunk bed single bed bunk bed alright hard soft hand luggages cant imagine 3 huge luggages ok stay considering cheapest available time booking triple breakfast windows faced garden quiet nighttime location heineken brewery close tram station vondelpark ofcourse city centre 1015 min walk breakfast simple sandwich materials coffee tea juice

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing isn't the right word...”
Reviews.Author: CaroleIreland
Reviews.Content: ok arrival discovered hotel reception facilities 8 buildings stay staff unfriendly unwelcoming carried building entering building overwhelmed stench dead mouse rubbish spilling bin door tiny toilet didnt flush wardrobe door hanging offwe prop chair closed lack space meant couldnt passed bed clean comfortable slip pillow realised sleeping drool stained yellow pillow day discovered bag rotting oranges bedso obviously arent cleaned properly breakfast season guests sit eat left standing dishes ran quickly daughter met grumpy unhelpful staff resented wash cup drink particular staff ignorant barged chores toaster basic breakfast requirement eating breakfast elsewhere hotel view didnt garden view dump rubbish fag staff somewhat helpful print boarding passes flight day thankfully rest amsterdam trip wonderfulwe definitly stay hotel
